description_txt: stated on November 19, 2015 in a speech at Georgetown University:

description_txt: stated on October 19, 2015 in op-ed in Austin American-Statesman:

description_txt: stated on November 19, 2015 in House Judiciary Committee hearing on his bill allowing concealed carry on college campuses:
quote_txt: Oregon’s Umpqua Community College "where the shooting occurred was a gun-free zone."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2015 in an appearance on MSNBC’s “The Last Word with Lawrence O’Donnell”:
quote_txt: After the Texas cutoff of aid to women’s health care services including Planned Parenthood clinics, "over 150,000… women lost the only health care they had. Our Medicaid birth rate shot up. It cost taxpayers over $130 million in one year alone in extra Medicaid birth costs."

description_txt: stated on October 29, 2015 in a press conference:

description_txt: stated on November 11, 2015 in Atlantic, Iowa, during a campaign event.:
